 1: <?php
 2: 
 3:     namespace UserApp;
 4: 
 5:     use \InvalidArgumentException;
 6: 
 7:     class ClientOptions {
 8:         private static $_global;
 9: 
10:         private $_options = array(
11:             "debug" => false,
12:             "secure" => true,
13:             "version" => 1,
14:             "app_id" => null,
15:             "token" => null,
16:             "base_address" => "api.userapp.io",
17:             "throw_errors" => true
18:         );
19: 
20:         public function __construct($options = null){
21:             if(is_array($options)){
22:                 $this->_options = $options;
23:             }
24:         }
25: 
26:         public function __set($name, $value){
27:             if(!array_key_exists($name, $this->_options)){
28:                 throw new InvalidArgumentException("Unable to set option. Option '".$name."' does not exist.");
29:             }
30: 
31:             if(is_bool($this->_options[$name]) && !is_bool($value)){
32:                 throw new InvalidArgumentException("Unable to set option '".$name."'. Value must be boolean.");
33:             }else if(is_string($this->_options[$name]) && $value != null && !is_string($value)){
34:                 throw new InvalidArgumentException("Unable to set option '".$name."'. Value must be a string.");
35:             }
36: 
37:             $this->_options[$name] = $value;
38:         }
39: 
40:         public function __get($name){
41:             if(!array_key_exists($name, $this->_options)){
42:                 throw new InvalidArgumentException("Unable to get option. Option '".$name."' does not exist.");
43:             }
44:             return $this->_options[$name];
45:         }
46: 
47:         public function set($options){
48:             if(!is_array($options)){
49:                 throw new InvalidArgumentException("Options must be an array.");
50:             }
51: 
52:             foreach($options as $option => $value){
53:                 $this->$option = $value;
54:             }
55:         }
56: 
57:         public function createCopy(){
58:             return new ClientOptions($this->_options);
59:         }
60: 
61:         public static function getGlobal(){
62:             if(self::$_global === null){
63:                 self::$_global = new ClientOptions();
64:             }
65:             return self::$_global;
66:         }
67:     }
68: 
69: ?>
